name: TatuBall
description:
With puzzle gameplay in a relaxed atmosphere with LoFi music, you must help an armadillo find burrows to survive during the seasons.

The gameplay uses the mechanic where you must choose a side to move, and you'll only be able to choose another side again after the tatu/armadillo is stopped.



Features:
  • 40 levels, 32 normal and 8 extra.
  • Different songs(LoFi musicstyle) by stages.
  • Stages designed with a smooth learning curve, but with some stages that will challenge you more between each stage


An experience designed in a pleasant environment and with music that helps to keep you relaxed.
